com.stormpath.sdk.http
Interface HttpRequest

public interface HttpRequest

Users not depending on the Servlet API will need to construct HttpRequest objects to be able to use this SDK's Oauth authentication mechanism.

Since:
1.0.RC
See Also:
HttpRequestBuilder

Method Detail

getHeaders

Map<String,String[]> getHeaders()
Returns the request's headers. Never null.

Returns:
the request's headers. Never null.
See Also:
getHeader(String)

getHeader

String getHeader(String headerName)
Returns the first available value for the request header with the specified name, or null if the header does not exist.

If there is more than one value, only the first will be returned and any subsequent values will be omitted. If you believe a header will have multiple values, use getHeaders() instead.

Parameters:
headerName - the name of the header to inspect
Returns:
the first available value for the request header with the specified name, or null if the header does not exist.

getMethod

HttpMethod getMethod()
Returns the request method.

Returns:
the request method.

getParameters

Map<String,String[]> getParameters()
Returns the request parameters.

Returns:
the request parameters.

getParameter

String getParameter(String parameterName)
Returns the first available value of the request parameter with the specified name or null if the parameter does not exist.

Parameters:
parameterName - the name of the parameter to look up
Returns:
the first available value of the request parameter with the specified name or null if the parameter does not exist.
Since:
1.0.RC2

getQueryParameters

String getQueryParameters()
Returns the request query parameter String, or null if there is no URI query parameter component.

Returns:
the request query parameter String, or null if there is no URI query parameter component.
